definition: rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
the rarer sth is, the greater its value (idiom)

sentences.english: For the dilute molecules, there is a change.
sentences.chinese: 對於稀溶液中的分子，有變化。

sentences.english: The clay is very stiff; we must make it thinner with water.
sentences.chinese: 這粘土非常稠，我們須用水使它變得稀一些。

sentences.english: For the laminar flow of Non-newtonian fluids some drag reduction, like turbulent flow, has been found.
sentences.chinese: 爲探討高分子稀溶液管內流動減阻提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: Lean-to and the most superior, this is the reason.
sentences.chinese: 物以稀而爲貴，便是這個道理。

sentences.english: Separation of the two components is accomplished by dissolving the frit in dilute nitric acid.
sentences.chinese: 將玻璃料溶於稀硝酸中來完成兩個組分的分離。

sentences.english: In the family, dilute solution of acetic acid is often used in detergents.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭中，乙酸稀溶液常被用作除垢劑。

sentences.english: Urethral opening with or thin or thick purulent.
sentences.chinese: 尿道口有或稀或稠的膿性分泌物。

sentences.english: Synthetic impulse and aperture radar (SIAR) with sparse array is a new kind of advanced meter-wave radar.

sentences.english: It may be composed of allelochemics such as alkaloids or terpenes.
sentences.chinese: 它可以由異種化合物例如生物堿或萜稀組成。

sentences.english: And one of them is in very dilute concentration.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個有很稀的濃度。

sentences.english: Biology pharmacy also is not " desolate pommelled horse is rare before the door ".

sentences.english: Traders with the golden touch do not talk.
sentences.chinese: 有點金術的交易商稀於言談。

sentences.english: Winter clouds snow-laden, cotton fluff flying.
sentences.chinese: 雪壓冬雲白絮飛，萬花紛謝一時稀。

sentences.english: His visage was meagre , his hair lank and thin, and his voice hollow.
sentences.chinese: 他容貌清瘦，頭髮又稀又長，嗓音低沉。

sentences.english: To reclaim acetic acid from its mother liquor is a problem in the technique proccess.
sentences.chinese: 稀醋酸母液中回收醋酸是一個技術難題。

sentences.english: The chitosan filaments can be formed through extruding chitosan into the dilute sodium hydroxide solution.
